attach.en: Attach MS Pro to the voice channel where you are and fetch new instructions if updated.
attach.zh: 將 Music Start Pro 加入您目前所在的語音房中，另外，當 Music Start Pro 更新指令時，可刷新指令集

bye.en: Detach Music Start Pro from the voice channel.
bye.zh: 將 Music Start Pro 踢出語音房

play.en: Play music if the bot is not playing any song. Otherwise, add the song to the playlist.
play.zh: 播放音樂，若音樂正在播放，則會加入播放清單。若 Music Start Pro 不在語音房中，則會自動呼叫 /attach 加入您目前所在的語音房

resume.en: Resume the player if you have called pause.

stop.en: Stop the player and jump to the first song of the playlist.
stop.zh: 停止播放，並回到播放清單最前端

jump.en: Jump to a song in the playlist by given index.
jump.zh: 根據索引跳到播放清單的某一首歌

remove.en: Remove a song in the playlist by given index.
remove.zh: 根據索引刪除播放清單的某一首歌

clear.en: Remove all songs in the playlist.

sort.en: Sort the playlist in alphabetical order.

shuffle.en: Shuffle the playlist except for the song currently playing.
shuffle.zh: 將播放清單隨機打亂，正在播放的歌位置不會受影響

vol.en: Set the volume by given `volume` or shows the volume without given `volume`. Default: 0.64
vol.zh: 設定音量，若不指定 num 則會顯示目前的音量，預設為 0.64

json.en: Add a batch of songs by given `json` or outputs the playlist in json format without given `json`.
json.zh: 將 json 格式的播放清單一次加入到播放清單中，若不填參數，則將目前的播放清單以 json 格式輸出

aqours.en: Add Aqours' songs that author recommends into playlist.
aqours.zh: 將作者精選的 Aqours 的歌單加入播放清單中

index.en: Any integer. Start at zero. Support overflow and negative number.
index.zh: index 為任意整數，由 0 開始編號，超過播放清單時自動取餘。支援負數，-1 表示最後一首

language.en: en: English, zh: 繁體中文
language.zh: en: English, zh: 繁體中文

volume_format_error.en: Volume must be in closed interval [0, 1]

cannot_remove_the_playing_song.en: Cannot remove the currently playing song

paused.zh: 音樂已暫停使用 /resume 以繼續

resume_error.zh: 繼續播放失敗，可使用 /jump 來重新播放

hello.en: Hello! Welcome to use Music Start Pro
hello.zh: 歡迎使用 Music Start Pro!

attach_fail.en: /attach failed. Music Start Pro cannot enter into the voice channel. Please check you are already in the voice channel.
attach_fail.zh: /attach 失敗，Music Start Pro 無法加入語音頻道。請確定您已經進入語音頻道。

player_error.en: The player is crashed! Try to use /jump to play other songs or re-attach by /bye and /attach
player_error.zh: 播放器發生錯誤！可利用 /jump 播放其他曲目，或使用 /bye 及 /attach 重新連接

robot_not_in_voice_channel.en: Music Start Pro is not in the voice channel. Use /attach to join the robot into the voice channel.
robot_not_in_voice_channel.zh: Music Start Pro 尚未進入語音頻道。可以使用 /attach 將機器人加入語音頻道

language_changed_successfully.en: Language is changed! We need some time to update so wait a minute please.
language_changed_successfully.zh: 語言切換成功！更新需要一段時間，請稍候
